short_description: chiang rai international is a religious school based in thailand.
long_description: the purpose-built campus of chiang rai international school is the first international school to be established in the beautiful and cultural city of chiang rai, northern thailand. at cris, we value cultural diversity within a global perspective, while imparting a strong sense of responsibility, independence, fairness and compassion. move left→move right↑move up↓move down+zoom in-zoom outhomejump left by 75%endjump right by 75%page upjump up by 75%page downjump down by 75%to navigate, press the arrow keys. our goal is to develop the whole child, intellectually, emotionally, and physically, providing a globally minded education through the foundation of christian values for their life that will enable them to contribute to the local and international community with confidence, responsibility, integrity, and sincerity. experience a dynamic, holistic education in an english-language setting.

generated_description: chiang rai international school (cris) is an international school located in mae yao, chiang rai province, northern thailand. established in 2010, cris aims to provide a globally minded education with a christian foundation, focusing on developing the whole child intellectually, emotionally, and physically. the school offers education from preschool to middle/high school, with a strong emphasis on building character through christian values, promoting confidence, responsibility, sincerity, and lifelong learning. cris is known for its first-class facilities and state-of-the-art educational technologies, fostering a compassionate, safe, and nurturing christian environment.
